title: Plants make food
creator_credit: Churchill Films and Gunther V. Fritsch
brief_description: In a simple way this film compares the plant to a factory of which the roots, stems and leaves form parts. The intake of raw materials is discussed and also the dependence on chlorophyll and sunlight. Mention is also made of the way plants store food.
